title: Riyadh says Israel has right to its own land
text:
Riyadh says Israel has right to its own land 12:01pm EDT - 01:02 
Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman is quoted as saying Israelis have the right to live peacefully on their own land, as do the Palestinians. It's a shift, because Riyadh doesn't officially recognize Israel.
